title: New Binary
text:
One day Chandrima decided to make a list of all numbers starting from 1 in binary format, the list would be like 1, 10, 11, 100 ... and so on. Now she get bored of this list and decide to remove any pattern having at least two consecutive ones and prepare a new list. The new list will be like 1, 10, 100, 101 ... and so on. She then thought if a number n is given to her can she find the nthmember of the new list. After trying for some time she comes to you for help. Can you help her by writing a program for her that could do the specified taskInputThe first line contains T (≤ 1000) test cases. The next T lines each contain one integer N (≤ 1015) for which you need to find the Nth member of the list.OutputOutput T lines each containing the required answer.ExampleInput:3
1
2
3Output:1
10
100
